text.p: These are the leading stories in the Tunisian press on Wednesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- President Ben Ali on Tuesday held a meeting with visiting Argentine Parliament Speaker Eduardo Menem on opportunities offered to the two countries to reinforce bilateral cooperation.
- Economic Development Minister Taoufik Baccar said foreign trade was improving. Sets April to June period for the final approval of the ninth development plan.

- Iraqi Higher Education and Scientific Research Humam Abdul-Khalek Abdul-Ghafur gave President Ben Ali a message from President Saddam Hussein briefing him on Iraq's relations with the United Nations.
- President Ben Ali to visit Argentina soon.
